customer.body:
Dear [AUTHORNAME],
My name is Nathiya and I am the Production Assistant for [JOURNALTITLE]. Thank you very much for sending in the corrections to your article,"[AUTHORTITLE]". I have read through your corrected proofs and note that a few Author Queries remain unanswered. Could you please provide responses for the below queries as soon as possible?
[AUTHORCORRECTON]
I have attached the PDF of your article for easy reference. Please note that the PDF is not an updated one. We will generate an updated PDF as soon as the queries have been resolved.
Please reply to all recipients of this message.
Thank you very much for your help.
Best Wishes
Nathiya
On behalf of the [JOURCODE] production team
Taylor and Francis
4 Park Square
Milton Park
Abingdon
Oxfordshire
OX14 4RN
UNITED KINGDOM
Email: nathiya@datapage.org
Fax: +44 (0)20 7017 6336
